content.raw:
I figured out the problem was that I was missing `ign-tools` in my colcon directory. After that I also needed to export `<colcon_workspace>/install/ignition-transport6/share/ignition` as my `IGN_CONFIG_PATH`. After those additional steps it started working. The errors I was receiving were actually because I had an older version of `ign-tools` installed to my system for `gazebo9`.

Here's the new version with the changes in pull request #65:

![gazebo-ducks.gif](data/bitbucket.org/repo/5q9rMzd/images/3201321364-gazebo-ducks.gif)
content.html:
I figured out the problem was that I was missing ign-tools in my colcon directory. After that I also needed to export <colcon_workspace>/install/ignition-transport6/share/ignition as my IGN_CONFIG_PATH. After those additional steps it started working. The errors I was receiving were actually because I had an older version of ign-tools installed to my system for gazebo9.

Here's the new version with the changes in pull request #65:
